update t_product_order_details set productId = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unitPrice = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, productBoxId = #{productBoxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addTimestamp = #{addTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{addUserKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{updUserKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updPgmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select c.picUrl as productPath, c.name as productName, a.unitPrice as productPrice, a.quantity as productNumber, a.productId from t_product_order_details a inner join t_product_box b on a.productBoxId = b.id inner join t_product c on c.id = a.productId where b.orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
